Topic: Intro to DNA and DNA sequencing technologies
Reading assignment: "Big Data: Astronomical or Genomical?" [Stephens, PLoS Biology, 2015]
Supplemental material: "Sequencing technologies - the next generation" (Michael L. Metzker, Nature Reviews Genetics, 2010)

Topic: Applications of DNA sequencing: Human genetics
Reading assignment: "Exome sequencing identifies the cause of a mendelian disorder" [Ng et al., Nature Genetics, 2010]
Supplemental material: "Diagnostic Applications of High-Throughput DNA Sequencing" [Boyd, Annual Review of Pathology: Mechanisms of Disease, 2013)

Topic: Applications of DNA sequencing technologies: Metagenomics
Reading assignment: (1) "Geospatial Resolution of Human and Bacterial Diversity with City-Scale Metagenomics" (Afshinnekoo, Cell Systems 2015) (2) Host lifestyle affects human microbiota on daily timescales [David et al., Genome Biology, 2014]
Supplemental material: "A Primer on Metagenomics" [Wooley et al., PLoS Comp Bio, 2008]

Reading assignment: (1) "Genomic research and human subject privacy" [Lin, Science, 2004] (2) "Identifying Personal Genomes by Surname Inference" (Gymrek et al., Science, 2013)
Supplemental material: "Improving human forensics through advances in genetics, genomics and molecular biology" [Kayser et al., Nature Reviews Genetics, 2014]

Reading assignment: "A vision for Ubiquitous Sequencing" (Erlich, BioRxiv, 2015) | "Improved data analysis for the MinION nanopore sequencer" (Jain et al., Nature Methods, 2015)
Supplemental material: "The potential and challenges of nanopore sequencing" [Branton et al., 2008, Nature Biotechnology]

Topic: Hackaton I: Who is this person?
Supplemental material: (1) "poRe: an R package for the visualization and analysis of nanopore sequencing data" [Watson et al., Bioinformatics, 2014] (2) "Poretools: a toolkit for analyzing nanopore sequence data" [Loman et al., Bioinformatics, 2014]

Reading assignment: "Ultrafast and memory-efficient alignment of short DNA sequencesto the human genome" [Langmead et al., Genome Biology, 2009]
Supplemental material: "A survey of sequence alignment algorithms for next-generation sequencing" [Li et al., Briefings in Bioinformatics, 2010]

Topic: Hackaton II: What did I eat?
DNA as storage devices or computers
Reading assignment: (1)" Toward practical high-capacity low-maintenance storage of digital information in synthesised DNA" [Goldman et al., Nature, 2013] (2) "Molecular Computation of Solutions toCombinatorial Problems" [Adleman, Science, 1994]
